articles.headline: Federal Reserve Signals Potential Rate Cut in Q1 2025
articles.summary: Fed Chair indicated openness to rate cuts if inflation continues to moderate, boosting market expectations for easing cycle to begin earlier than anticipated.
articles.impact_assessment: Positive for equities and bonds, potential USD weakness

articles.headline: Oil Prices Surge 4% on OPEC+ Production Cut Extension
articles.summary: OPEC+ agrees to extend production cuts through Q2 2025, pushing Brent crude above $78 per barrel. Energy stocks rally while concerns mount over inflationary impact.
articles.impact_assessment: Positive for energy holdings, negative for inflation outlook

articles.headline: China Manufacturing PMI Beats Expectations, Signals Recovery
articles.summary: China's manufacturing PMI rose to 51.2, exceeding forecasts and marking third consecutive month of expansion. Export orders show strongest growth in 18 months.
articles.impact_assessment: Positive for emerging markets and global trade-sensitive assets

articles.headline: Major Bank Announces $2B Loss on Commercial Real Estate Portfolio
articles.summary: Regional bank discloses significant write-downs on office property loans, raising concerns about broader commercial real estate exposure across banking sector.
articles.impact_assessment: Negative for financial sector, watch for contagion risk

articles.headline: EU Proposes New ESG Reporting Requirements for Asset Managers
articles.summary: European Commission unveils enhanced sustainability disclosure rules, requiring quarterly ESG impact reporting by 2026. Industry groups warn of compliance costs.

articles.headline: Tech Giants Lead Market Rally Amid AI Optimism
articles.summary: Magnificent Seven stocks add $500B in market cap as analysts raise AI revenue forecasts. Microsoft and Apple reach new all-time highs on enterprise AI adoption trends.
articles.impact_assessment: Positive for technology holdings, supports current overweight position

articles.headline: Treasury Yields Fall as Inflation Expectations Moderate
articles.summary: 10-year Treasury yield drops to 4.15% as breakeven inflation rates decline. Bond market pricing suggests confidence in Fed achieving soft landing.
articles.impact_assessment: Positive for fixed income portfolio, duration positioning favorable
